alert.note: Alert for Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 1:19AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Arizona, including the following area, Western Pima County. * WHEN...From 1 PM MST this afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A very wet weather pattern will lead to an elevated risk of heavy rainfall. Storm coverage will increase, however will still be intermittent with periods of few storms. Any storm that forms will be at an elevated risk for flooding rainfall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
